['Curiosity - You are an independent thinker, able to work autonomously or with a team, and capable of taking on loosely defined problems and translating complex thinking into practical application. Typically employees take about three or four weeks each year.", 'Flexible work-from-home options - Much of our workflow is online, and for meetings, we have dedicated video-conferencing setups.
